body:
The STRUMPACK interface was added to Trilinos in this PR: https://github.com/trilinos/Trilinos/pull/8192
See also this issue: https://github.com/trilinos/Trilinos/issues/7413

I found it strange that I had to add: 
`define('Amesos2_ENABLE_STRUMPACK', True)`
even though `TPL_ENABLE_STRUMPACK=ON` is already set.

@keitat @jwillenbring @ndellingwood @srajama1 
@lisaclaus @xiaoyeli
title: Trilinos: Add STRUMPACK dependency
